nodes.text: Samsam was a Human male Corellian scientist who was a friend to Bant'ena Fhernan during the Clone Wars. As Bant'ena was captured by the separatists in 21 BBY, Samsam was used as leverage against Bant'ena under Lok Durd's command. However, he was shot by a Separatist assassin while power-gliding along the shore of Lake Radu.
